text: Norma Judith Torres, (n√©e Barillas ; born April 4, 1965) is a Guatemalan-born American politician. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives for California's 35th congressional district since 2015. She was a member of the California State Senate representing the 35th district. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Torres was born Norma Judith Barillas in Guatemala. When she was five, she and her uncle came to the United States. She originally arrived on a tourist visa, but became a legal resident in her teens and became a citizen in 1992. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Guatemalan politicians Category:United States representatives from California Category:People from Pomona, California Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Los Angeles County, California
title: Norma Torres
